translations: n．倾斜，斜线：一个方向上的倾斜或斜线。
v．倾斜，歪斜：使某物或某人处于倾斜的位置。
· The sun slants through the window.

sentences.sentence: Most handwriting slants to the right.
sentences.translation: 大多数手写体都向右斜。

sentences.sentence: The path slants the lawn to the depths of the woods.
sentences.translation: 小径斜穿草地通到了密林深处。

sentences.sentence: This phrase can introduce new ideas or slants to the topic of discussion.
sentences.translation: 这个短语可以引进新观点或转移讨论的话题。
